name: Double Exposure
description:
Our late submission to Yuri Game Jam 2019. The game is around 20.000 words, featuring original sprites, cgs and music. 

Synopsis:

Serena has worked for years to attain her invaluable position as a world-renowned photographer. She lives her life away from social situations, concerning herself almost exclusively with honing her craft. 

Her life takes an interesting turn when one morning a young and lively model named Lizzie starts working with her, bringing along foregone bagage that might be too heavy for Serena to handle.

Team:

HeWhoYawns- Writing, Scripting

Howard Jones- Sprite & CG art, UI art and programming

Tavian St. James- Music

foleso- UI art

We've all put quite a lot of work into it and we'd love to hear what you think!
